Name: bert_implementation
Title: Implementing and Evaluating BERT for Diverse NLP Tasks
Experiment: Integrate BERT into the existing NLP pipeline, replacing current language models. Evaluate its performance on various tasks like sentiment analysis, named entity recognition, and question answering, comparing the results with state-of-the-art models currently in use. Analyze resource consumption and practicality in different computational environments.

Name: xlnet_permutation_modeling
Title: Permutation-Based Autoregressive Pretraining with XLNet
Experiment: Implement the XLNet model by incorporating permutation-based modeling and two-stream self-attention. Integrate segment recurrence and relative encoding from Transformer-XL. Conduct experiments on benchmark datasets to compare with BERT and evaluate performance improvements.
